paper_abstract: We consider the problem of minimising flow time on related machines and give an O(log P)-approximation algorithm for the offline case and an O(log 2 P)-competitive algorithm for the online version. This improves upon the previous best bound of O(log(2) p log S) on the competitive ratio. Here P is the ratio of the maximum to the minimum processing time of a job and S is the ratio of the maximum to the minimum speed of a machine.
paper_title: Better algorithms for minimizing average flow-time on related machines
